cells.data:
What is the least amount of functions that are needed to start testing game:
  1. Multiple levels automatically generated
  2. Scoring system design and implemented
  3. Minimum number of obstacles (3 variations of each obstacle)
    1. Portable burners
    2. Electric shock
    3. Saw blade
    4. Gems
    5. Coins
  4. Damage indicator
  5. Firestorm
  6. Save and restore game status
  7. Game Center integration and whatever is used in Android
  8. In-app purchases
